pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:5.1: 96. The training rule on not wearing a bust cover
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:6.2: At that time a nun entered a village for almsfood without wearing her bust cover.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:6.3: While she was walking along a street a whirlwind lifted up her upper robes.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:6.6: Because she was made fun of by those people, she was humiliated.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:7.1: After returning to the nuns’ dwelling place she told the nuns what had happened.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:7.2: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:7.4: “How can a nun enter an inhabited area without wearing her bust cover?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:7.5: “Is it true, monks, that a nun did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:7.8: How can a nun enter an inhabited area without wearing her bust cover?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:7.9: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:7.10: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:8.1: ‘If a nun enters an inhabited area without wearing her bust cover, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:9.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:11.2: for the purpose of concealing the body below the collar bone and above the navel.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:12.2: if she crosses the boundary of an enclosed village, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:12.3: If she goes beyond the vicinity of an unenclosed village, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:13.2: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:14.1: The thirteenth training rule is finished.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:14.2: The ninth chapter on sunshades and sandals is finished.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:17.1: “Venerables, the one hundred and sixty-six rules on offenses entailing confession have been recited.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:17.2: In regard to this I ask you,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:17.8: You are pure in this and therefore silent. I will remember it thus.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:18.1: The section on minor rules has been completed.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:18.2: The chapter on offenses entailing confession in the nuns’ analysis is finished.
